content.title: President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai'
content.cardText: Cultural and project manager, social activist, president of NGO 'Art Community 'PLAI', founder of artistic space 'PICH', director of 'AIR Fest' and 'Ticket to the SUN' festivals.

content.title: Vice President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai'
content.cardText: Cultural and project manager, public activist, vice-president of NGO “Art Community 'PLAI', co-founder of artistic space 'PICH', program director of 'AIR Fest' and 'Ticket to the SUN' festivals.

content.title: Vice President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai'
content.cardText: Actor, member of NGO 'Art Community 'PLAI', co-founder and art-director of artistic space 'PICH', theatrical curator of 'AIR Fest' and 'Ticket to the SUN' festivals.
Project communicator of NGO “Art Community 'PLAI' and artistic space 'PICH', targeting specialist.
Project designer of NGO “Art Community 'PLAI', administrator of artistic space 'PICH' and art store.
